reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Enhancing Access to Justice for Sexual + Gender Minorities in Kenya (follow-up project)

description.narrative: The main goal of the project is strengthening access to justice for LGBTIQ persons, which has been further weakened by the Covid-19 pandemic, through means of legal and psychosocial aid as well as strategic litigation. It also seeks to improve the organisa tional capacity of NGLHRC. http://www.nglhrc.com/
